rows.label: campfev11_320_150_msg0001
rows.name:
The Royal Ship, huh... I'm
still a little hesitant.

rows.label: campfev11_320_150_msg0002
rows.name:
It's okay. There was no
need to be so formal.

rows.label: campfev11_320_150_msg0003
rows.name:
Really? Well, if you say so,
Hikari, I guess it'll be fine.

rows.label: campfev11_320_150_msg0004
rows.name: Still, you should watch out for her.

rows.label: campfev11_320_150_msg0006
rows.name:
There's this one person who's
always glaring at me, telling
me to act more polite.

rows.label: campfev11_320_150_msg0008
rows.name:
Yeah... I can see myself
getting scolded...

rows.label: campfev11_320_150_msg0009
rows.name:
I'm not good at that stuff,
but I guess I'll have to
try to be careful.
